apis.description: Returns the list of sections for this course.

operations.notes: Returns the list of sections for this course.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: - "students": Associations to include with the group. Note: this is only available if you have permission to view users or grades in the course - "avatar_url": Include the avatar URLs for students returned. - "enrollments": If 'students' is also included, return the section enrollment for each student - "total_students": Returns the total amount of active and invited students for the course section - "passback_status": Include the grade passback status.

apis.description: Creates a new section for this course.

operations.notes: Creates a new section for this course.

parameters.name: course_section[sis_section_id]
parameters.description: The sis ID of the section

parameters.name: course_section[start_at]
parameters.description: Section start date in ISO8601 format, e.g. 2011-01-01T01:00Z

parameters.name: course_section[end_at]
parameters.description: Section end date in ISO8601 format. e.g. 2011-01-01T01:00Z

parameters.name: course_section[restrict_enrollments_to_section_dates]
parameters.description: Set to true to restrict user enrollments to the start and end dates of the section.

apis.description:
Move the Section to another course.  The new course may be in a different account (department),
but must belong to the same root account (institution).

operations.notes:
Move the Section to another course.  The new course may be in a different account (department),
but must belong to the same root account (institution).

apis.description: Undo cross-listing of a Section, returning it to its original course.

operations.notes: Undo cross-listing of a Section, returning it to its original course.

apis.description: Modify an existing section.  See the documentation for {api:SectionsController#create create API action}.

operations.notes: Modify an existing section.  See the documentation for {api:SectionsController#create create API action}.

apis.description: Gets details about a specific section

operations.notes: Gets details about a specific section

apis.description: Gets details about a specific section

operations.notes: Gets details about a specific section

apis.description: Delete an existing section.  Returns the former Section.

operations.notes: Delete an existing section.  Returns the former Section.

id.description: The unique identifier for the section.

sis_section_id.description: The sis id of the section. This field is only included if the user has permission to view SIS information.

integration_id.description: Optional: The integration ID of the section. This field is only included if the user has permission to view SIS information.

sis_import_id.description: The unique identifier for the SIS import if created through SIS. This field is only included if the user has permission to manage SIS information.

course_id.description: The unique Canvas identifier for the course in which the section belongs

sis_course_id.description: The unique SIS identifier for the course in which the section belongs. This field is only included if the user has permission to view SIS information.

start_at.description: the start date for the section, if applicable

end_at.description: the end date for the section, if applicable

nonxlist_course_id.description: The unique identifier of the original course of a cross-listed section

total_students.description: optional: the total number of active and invited students in the section
